nodes.text: The Jewel of Zenda was a large red gemstone found on the planet of Naboo. The Jewel of Zenda was considered to be a royal jewel by the people of Naboo.

During her reign as sovereign of the Royal House of Naboo, Queen Amidala wore the Jewel of Zenda in the headpiece of her royal gown. The jewel could also be set into a pendant and worn around the neck.

Queen Apailana wore a royal gown similar in design to Amidala's dress following the formation of the Galactic Empire. She apparently wore the Jewel of Zenda in her headdress when the 501st Legion assassinated her and her Jedi bodyguards in Theed.
